exceptions.exn: In environment l, m, a, b : lb H1 : l ⪯ m H2 : a ⪯ b Unable to unify "m" with "l".

ctx: destruct a, b; simpl in *; try contradiction; auto.
exceptions.exn: [Focus] Wrong bullet -: Current bullet - is not finished.

ctx: destruct a, b; simpl in *; try contradiction; auto.
exceptions.exn: In environment H : forall f : bool -> bool -> bool, (forall x a b : bool, a ⪦ b -> f x a ⪦ f x b) -> f ⟘ ⟘ = ⟘ -> forall l m k : lb, l ⪯ m -> lb_pointwise f k l ⪯ lb_pointwise f k m l, m : lb b : bool b0 : lb H1 : l ⪯ m H2 : nil ⪯ b :: b0 Unable to unify "?M2088 ↓ ?M2090 ⪯ ?M2089 ↓ ?M2091" with "l ↑ nil ⪯ m ↑ (b :: b0)".

original: intro H1. intro H2. apply lb_pointwise_mono_left. - intros x a b Hab. destruct a, b; simpl in *; try contradiction; auto. - auto. - apply lb_meet_mono; auto.
